Vocab 1

Gesnuguig nun'ji.

My head hurts.

Gesnuguig 'ns'tuaqan.

My ear hurts.

Gesnuguig 'npugug.

My eye hurts.

Gesnuguig 'nsisqon.

My nose hurts.

Gesnuguig 'ntun.

My mouth hurts.

Gesnuguig 'nsi.

My lip hurts.

Gesnuguig nipit.

My tooth hurts.

Gesnuguig 'ntugwape'gn.

My jaw hurts.

Gesnuguig 'nijinuan.

My cheek hurts.

Gesnuguig 'nsisgw.

My face hurts.

Gesnuguig 'ntlmaqan.

My shoulder hurts.

Gesnuguig 'npitnoqom.

My arm hurts.

Gesnuguig 'npitn.

My hand hurts.

Gesnuguig 'ntijin.

My thumb hurts.

Gesnuguig 'npusgun.

My chest hurts.

Gesnuguig 'npaqam.

My back hurts.

Gesnuguig nmusti.

My belly hurts.

Gesnuguig nili.

My bellybutton hurts.

Gesnuguig 'ngat.

My leg/foot hurts.

Gesnuguig nulugun.

My thigh hurts.

Gesnuguig 'ngajign.

My lower leg hurts.

Gesnuguig nmaqaqjigeweim.

My big toe hurts.

Gesnuguig 'ngamlamun.

My heart hurts.
